DOC.brief_title: Study Natural History FFR Guided Percutaneous Coronary Intervention
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , prospective cohort . About 10,000 patient FFR enrol multi center Korea .
DOC.criteria: Age 35 year old FFR measurement one coronary artery stenosis Willing able provide inform , write consent Stenosis TIMI < 3 flow Graft vessel Ejection fraction < 30 % Angiographic evidence extreme tortuosity calcify coronary vessel Suspected coronary spasm even sufficient nitrate inject Life expectancy < 2 year Planned cardiac surgery plan major non cardiac surgery Woman breastfeeding , pregnant planning become pregnant course study Imaging study specific exclusion criterion visuallyestimated angiographic reference segment diameter < 2.75mm > 4.0mm Inappropriate IVUS/VH/OCT procedure : inability image wire catheter pas tight stenosis , severe calcification , angulation
